knimeNode.name: TF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the relative term frequency (tf) of each term according to each document and adds a column containing the tf value.

fullDescription.intro: Computes the relative term frequency (tf) of each term according to each document and adds a column containing the tf value. The value is computed by dividing the absolute frequency of a term according to a document by the number of all terms of that document.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the document column to use for frequency counting.
If relative frequency is checked, the relative term frequency is computed, otherwise the absolute term frequency.

inPort.name: Terms and related documents input table

ports.inPort: The input table which contains terms and documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains terms documents and a corresponding frequency value.
